Package com.qdc.lims.repository

package com.qdc.lims.repository
Spring Data JPA repositories for querying and persisting entities.

Repositories are the primary persistence gateway used by the service layer and, in some cases, directly by desktop controllers.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.qdc.lims
    LIMS application root package.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    CommissionLedgerRepository
    Repository interface for CommissionLedger entities, providing queries for commission tracking.
    DepartmentRepository
    Repository for Department master data.
    DoctorRepository
    Repository interface for Doctor entities, providing standard CRUD operations.
    InventoryItemRepository
    Repository interface for InventoryItem entities, providing stock management queries.
    LabInfoRepository
    Repository interface for LabInfo entity, providing access to laboratory configuration settings.
    LabOrderRepository
    Repository interface for LabOrder entities, providing CRUD operations and custom queries for dashboard statistics and patient order history.
    LabResultRepository
    Repository interface for LabResult entities, providing CRUD operations for lab test results.
    PanelRepository
    Repository for Panel entities.
    PatientRepository
    Repository for Patient registration and search operations.
    PaymentRepository
    Repository for miscellaneous income and expense Payment entries.
    PermissionRepository
    Repository interface for Permission entities.
    ReferenceRangeRepository
    Repository interface for ReferenceRange entities, providing CRUD operations for test reference ranges.
    RoleRepository
    Repository interface for Role entities.
    SupplierLedgerRepository
    Repository interface for SupplierLedger entities, providing queries for supplier transaction history.
    SupplierRepository
    Repository interface for Supplier entities, providing standard CRUD operations.
    SystemConfigurationRepository
    Repository for key-value SystemConfiguration entries.
    TestCategoryRepository
    Repository for TestCategory entries.
    TestConsumptionRepository
    Repository interface for TestConsumption entities, providing recipe lookup for inventory management.
    TestDefinitionRepository
    Repository interface for TestDefinition entities, providing CRUD operations and custom queries.
    TestRecipeRepository
    Repository for TestRecipe definitions that describe inventory consumption per test.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for User entities, providing authentication-related queries.
